comments:
Hi,
I installed the last versions of Eclipse platform (eclipse-platform-3.3M2-solaris-gtk.zip) and CDT (org.eclipse.cdt-3.1.1-solaris.sparc.tar.tar). If I try to create a debug session (Run->Debug...->...New...) the  error message "An error has occurred. See error log for more details." appears. The same behaviour occurs in case of the platform version eclipse-platform-3.2-solaris-gtk.zip. I have used the new empty workspace location and I have removed the whole "eclipse" folder before Eclipse installation. Could you advice me?
Regards,
Josef

Error log fragments:

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 144758 ***
The generic standard command factory for gdb/mi debugger is missing.

Created an attachment (id=53380)
The patch adds a generic command factory for gdb/mi debugger type.
*** Bug 163612 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Fixed in the 3.1.2 and HEAD branches.
*** Bug 172478 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
